snapshot_name: Meal Prep Service Complete Automation System
use_case: Complete business automation for meal prep service businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Meal Prep Service business owners, food & beverage professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for meal prep service businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the meal prep service industry.
key_benefits: Industry-specific funnels for meal prep service services
Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Meal Prep Service businesses wanting to automate operations
New meal prep service businesses needing a complete system
Established food & beverage companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Meal Prep Service Lead Capture Funnel
Meal Prep Service Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Meal Prep Service Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
